title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message:
water damage?, coke spill in november

green light, fan spin, no chime with charger plugged in,
no charger, running off battery, boot with folder icon
plug in charger, disconnect battery, folder icon remains
after running for 5 mins weird smell
no apparant corrosion

scratching my head, checked one wire, seems ok checked d6990 and u6990, seems ok

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: Got green light, does it charge? PPBUS present on charger? Check for heat if something smells funny.

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message:
green light
12v on ppvbat
20v on dcin
nothing getting warm

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: 12V? Need more digits. Does it charge the battery? Orange light? Not using a 45W charger by accident?

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message:
I only have 80w chargers in my office
something strange,without the battery plugged in the voltage out of the battery connector is 3v something, 
when the battery is plugged in it starts charging 11.5v going up past 12.06
orange light is on

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: The battery connector is not PPBUS, need PPBUS......You sure it is not a Chinese shit charger?

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message:
geniune charger, again, I only have genuine chargers
ok starting with the battery plugged in first and then plugging in the charger to turn it on
ppbus_g3h 12.03v   ppbat 12.06 orrange light
unplug charger 
ppbus 10.97v ppbat 10.95v
plug back in charger, unplug battery 
ppbus 0.227 ppbat 12.61

Im trying to give you as much info as I can because I have to wait 24 hours to get a message back, I will measure what you want measured

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: Did you check the basics around U7000? Resistance between pins 17/18 27/28 etc.?

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: have you given up on this? I need to get it fixed

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message:
Lets get some new measurements now. 

Voltage on PPBUS without battery connected?
ADAPTER_EN present?

Do you get an orange light when battery connected?

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: Only thing I can think of now is crap under the SMC.

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: ive reflowed the smc and now i get a fan spin, no chime, no green light, turns off using power button, wont turn on using power button, only cable in, i thought this was one of the models that didnt turn on then the charger was plugged in, turns off after like 30 seconds of being plugged in

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: So SMC got messed up, probably still glue under it. Pull and reball or replace.

title: 820-3115 alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
message: why is it always the smc, its so annoying, and ive lost my stencils :(
